Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $329.99 - $249.94
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:22:39 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Choose KAMRUI, Choose Professional Mini PC

KAMRUI JK06 FANLESS MINI DESKTOP PC

—A partner you need whether in the office or at home—

Are you still worried about your traditional desktop pc taking up a large space? Don’t worry!

The new KAMRUI JK06 mini pc with the magnetic stand is a sleek alternative to a traditional tower PC.

■ The fanless design, more silent!

■ Honeycomb design, more solid!

■ The magnetic stand, more steady!

■ Expandable storage, more capacity!

■ Compact size and lightweight, more flexible!

■ The 11th gen N5100 processor with low consumption, more durable!

Add More Power to Your Workspace with the KAMRUI JK06 Mini PC with 11th-gen Intel processor

The fanless mini pc is equipped with an 11th generation Intel Jasper Lake N5100 (4M Cache, up to 2.90 GHz ) processor. Compared to the Intel Celeron Jasper Lake N5095 (15W), a low-power 6W Mini computer that reduces power consumption by up to 150%. For performance, the JK06 mini computer tower is improved by 30% more than Intel Celeron J4125. Lower power consumption makes it generate less heat and has outstanding performance.

Create A More Peaceful Environment for Your Lovely Babies or Wife

Let’s take a closer look, and see what we discover!

Packed with Connectivity

Designed with 2 x USB 2.0 ports, 2 x USB 3.0 ports, 1 x Type C (data transfer only), 1 x Gigabit Ethernet port, 1 x Micro SD Card port, 1 x HDMI port and 1x VGA port (# of Displays Supported: # of 2), 1 x Audio Jack port.

Strong Network Support

KAMRUI JK06 micro computer providing Wi-Fi-5, Bluetooth 4.2, 2.4G+5G dual band WiFi and network connectivity, these ensures you can do everything you want at the speeds you need.

Install the OS You Want

KAMRUI JK06 mini computer tower preinstalled Windows 11 pro OS. Moreover, if you want to install Windows 10, Ubuntu or Linux. The compact pc will support and be compatible with different operating systems.

Transfer Files in Seconds

Transfer movies, photos, and music at speeds of up to 5 Gbps via the USB-C port and the dual USB 3.0 ports, saving you time on large file transfers between your mini pc and external hard drives or networks.

To Create! To Win! Don’t Let the Storage Limit Your Imagination

Massive storage capacity for storing huge amounts of pictures, videos, music and more.

KAMRUI small form factor pc has 3 ways to expand the storage as below:

1. The micro SD card slot also support up to 128GB of expandable storage;

2. It’s expandable with the addition of up to 2 TB of 2.5-inch SSD or HDD[NOT INCLUDED] fitted in the base expansion box.

3. The mini pc designed with 4 USB ports which you can add USB flash drives[NOT INCLUDED] or external hard drives[NOT INCLUDED].

Designed for Those who Work and Study in A Small Space Without Much Room on Their Desk

With JK06 mini PC versatility, plus better connectivity with HDMI 2.0 (4K@60Hz) and VGA ports(1080 P), the compact and lightweight PC adapts to you.

The magnetic stand that comes with JK06 minipc as a gift, it is a capable and affordable Windows 11 Pro desktop computer that you can place almost anywhere given its small form factor. Whether vertical or horizontal style placed if you entered an idea bottleneck, why not try a different placed mode? If you don’t want to JK06 mini pc comes with the magnetic stand, just take the stand off to make it lay down on the desk. It’s time to think outside the box. Just put it on your desk in a different way as you want.

Not Only a Business Mini PC, But Also a Home Mini Computer

KAMRUI Express Service Channels and Warm Tips

*Regardless of your dissatisfaction with our products for any reason, please let us know so that the problem can be resolved promptly and quickly.

These are the steps to find the seller: “Log in Amazon” → “Your Account” → “Your orders” → “Ask Product Question.”

Service: We have a 12-month shelf life for return and exchange, the first reply within 24 hours, and 1-to-1 professional service personnel to answer any questions for you. Your use is only the beginning of our service.

Warm Tips:

Installing unofficial systems may cause driver incompatibility or instability. We highly recommended installing the official factory system.To avoid initial setup issues, the first time you use this mini pc, don’t connect network or wifi until the windows system of your mini pc is running.

【POWERFUL COMPUTING CAPACITY】The JK06 mini PC features a Quad-Core Intel 11th generation Jasper Laker N5100(4M Cache, up to 2.80 GHz). Lower power consumption of 6W makes it less heat, and more outstanding endurance performance than Intel Celeron J4125, N5105 and N5095 processors. It’s versatile enough to handle most any workload, light gaming or general computing. Whether you use it for professional or personal needs, it’ll give you all the power you require.
【ENJOY SPACE-SAVING WORKSPACE】The JK06 mini tower computer has black housing and a compact form factor that’s about 6.88×5.31×1.57-inch. A low-power PC that is so convenient that you can place this fully fetched Windows 11 Ready PC on your desk. With the free attached magnetic stand, you can place vertical or horizontal styles as you want. That is not the only advantage of the compact sized PC. With low power consumption, it’s a sleek alternative to a traditional tower PC.
【GREAT ASSISTANT FOR YOU】The JK06 mini desktop pc doesn’t just a honeycomb design, it also features ventilation holes on the housing to improve heat dissipation and reliability. This efficient thermal management keeps its cool even under the heaviest processing loads. Indeed, featuring the fanless design, when you work from home, and absolutely quiet micro computer will not disturb your cute babies or lovely pets.
【PERSONAL DATA DATABASE】8GB RAM memory means you get to the files that you need quicker. Storage 256GB M.2 Solid State Drive(MAX. 2TB), which provides plenty of storage room and high-performance responsiveness to access and run your applications quickly. There’s an SD card slot for additional storage. If you need more storage to expand, 2.5-inch SSD(MAX. 2TB)would be your great choice. Don’t let the storage to limit your imagination. To Creative, To Win.
【4K UHD DUAL SCREEN SUPPORT】The JK06 micro computer has one HDMI 2.0 and one VGA port that supports dual screen display, which setup has two modes-mirror or extended modes to analyze data better and improve work efficiency. Built-in Intel UHD Graphics, surfing websites using Chrome and other browsers, as well as watching Netflix, Youtube, Hulu, Philo, and other streaming services. It is fast enough to decode and accelerate UHD video content 4096×2160 video playback at 60 Hz.
【WORK AND PLAY ANYWHERE】The JK06 small PC has all the ports you need for all the peripherals you need including 1 x DC, 1 x Type C(data transfer only), 2 x USB 3.0, 2 x USB 2.0, 1 x LAN, 1 x HDMI, 1 x VGA, 1 x Audio in&out and 1 x TF Card slots. What’s more, it supports Linux, Wake On LAN, RTC Wake, and Auto Power On. Work and play your way virtually anywhere.
【FIND MORE PLEASURE ON JK06】The small form factor pc is perfect for a wide range of business scenarios, including signage, point-of-sale (POS) systems and intelligent vending machines. Whether it’s online chatting or professional video meetings, the dual band Wi-Fi 2.4G+5G connection is up to the task. It’s perfect for home office, light games, digital security and surveillance, digital signage, media center, conference room etc. Also Ideal for visually home entertainment, HTPC.
【ALL-AROUND PROTECTION】Say goodbye to the traditional desktop computer. KAMRUI JK06 mini pc with the magnetic holder which is equipped with a layer of silicone on the bottom. The comprehensive protection design makes leaves zero scratches on the desk. Moreover, whenever you need us, KAMRUI employees will always be here and handle all problems for you. Who wouldn’t want a mini pc? A great gift idea for your parent, friend, family or elders etc.

KAMRUI Mini PC

Choose KAMRUI, Choose Professional Mini PC
